segments.text: I have been employed as a secretary at a trading company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think of your present job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you get to office ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I go to the office by bus every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does your work consist of exactly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My main responsibility is trouble-shooting between top management and the general employees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you mind working overtime at night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , often my boss requires overtime work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much money are you making a month ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why do you plan to change your job ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would like to have a job that is more lively than my present one . Besides , I would like to practise my English in my work . As my present employer deals with China trade towards China only , there isn â€™ t much chance to speak English .
segments.speaker: S2
